title: 3 bedroom 2018 Manufactured Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: If you’re looking for a beautiful place to call home, consider Oakland Glens, a well-maintained, all-ages, manufactured home community.
Oakland Glens is proud to be located in the Walled Lake School District and within miles of many local dining, shopping, and entertainment venues.
Currently, we are offering a 2018 model year, at 1056 sq. feet.
This home will not last long!
Call today to schedule a tour and get a glimpse of what it’s like to live in a highly sought-after community in Novi.
